response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our unique product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value and potential impact, I understand it might seem expensive at first glance. However, considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory offer for you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $12,000. This price not only reflects its high quality and functionality but also provides you with a substantial saving compared to its market value. I trust that this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency, productivity, and satisfaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
